verses.verse: "Beware <WG4337> of practicing <WG4160> your righteousness <WG1343> before <WG1715> men <WG444> to be noticed <WG2300> by them; otherwise <WG7507> you have <WG2192> no <WG3756> reward <WG3408> with your Father <WG3962> who <WG3588> is in heaven. <WG3772>

"When <WG3752> therefore <WG3767> you give <WG4160> alms, <WG1654> do not sound <WG4537> a trumpet <WG4537> before <WG1715> you, as the hypocrites <WG5273> do <WG4160> in the synagogues <WG4864> and in the streets, <WG4505> that they may be honored <WG1392> by men. <WG444> Truly <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you, they have <WG568> their reward <WG3408> in full. <WG568>
"But when you give <WG4160> alms, <WG1654> do not let your left <WG710> hand <WG710> know <WG1097> what <WG5101> your right <WG1188> hand <WG1188> is doing <WG4160>
that your alms <WG1654> may be in secret; <WG2927> and your Father <WG3962> who sees <WG991> in secret <WG2927> will repay <WG591> you.

"And when <WG3752> you pray, <WG4336> you are not to be as the hypocrites; <WG5273> for they love <WG5368> to stand <WG2476> and pray <WG4336> in the synagogues <WG4864> and on the street <WG4116> corners, <WG1137> in order <WG3704> to be seen <WG5316> by men. <WG444> Truly <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you, they have <WG568> their reward <WG3408> in full. <WG568>

"But you, when <WG3752> you pray, <WG4336> go <WG1525> into your inner <WG5009> room, <WG5009> and when you have shut <WG2808> your door, <WG2374> pray <WG4336> to your Father <WG3962> who <WG3588> is in secret, <WG2927> and your Father <WG3962> who sees <WG991> in secret <WG2927> will repay <WG591> you.

"And when you are praying, <WG4336> do not use <WG945> meaningless <WG945> repetition, <WG945> as the Gentiles <WG1482> do, for they suppose <WG1380> that they will be heard <WG1522> for their many <WG4180> words. <WG4180>
"Therefore <WG3767> do not be like <WG3666> them; for your Father <WG3962> knows <WG3609> what <WG3739> you need, <WG5532> before <WG4253> you ask <WG154> Him.
"Pray, <WG4336> then, <WG3767> in this <WG3779> way: <WG3779> 'Our Father <WG3962> who <WG3588> art in heaven, <WG3772> Hallowed <WG37> be Thy name. <WG3686>
'Thy kingdom <WG932> come. <WG2064> Thy will <WG2307> be done, <WG1096> On earth <WG1093> as it is in heaven. <WG3772>
'Give <WG1325> us this <WG4594> day <WG4594> our daily <WG1967> bread. <WG740>
'And forgive <WG863> us our debts, <WG3783> as we also <WG2532> have forgiven <WG863> our debtors. <WG3781>

'And do not lead <WG1533> us into temptation, <WG3986> but deliver <WG4506> us from evil. <WG4190> [For Thine <WG4771> is the kingdom, <WG932> and the power, <WG1411> and the glory, <WG1391> forever. <WG165> Amen. <WG281>]'
"For if <WG1437> you forgive <WG863> men <WG444> for their transgressions, <WG3900> your heavenly <WG3770> Father <WG3962> will also <WG2532> forgive <WG863> you.
"But if <WG1437> you do not forgive <WG863> men, <WG444> then <WG3761> your Father <WG3962> will not forgive <WG863> your transgressions. <WG3900>

"And whenever <WG3752> you fast, <WG3522> do not put <WG1096> on a gloomy <WG4659> face <WG4659> as the hypocrites <WG5273> [do,] for they neglect <WG853> their appearance <WG4383> in order <WG3704> to be seen <WG5316> fasting <WG3522> by men. <WG444> Truly <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you, they have <WG568> their reward <WG3408> in full. <WG568>
"But you, when you fast, <WG3522> anoint <WG218> your head, <WG2776> and wash <WG3538> your face <WG4383>

so <WG3704> that you may not be seen <WG5316> fasting <WG3522> by men, <WG444> but by your Father <WG3962> who <WG3588> is in secret; <WG2931> and your Father <WG3962> who sees <WG991> in secret <WG2931> will repay <WG591> you.

"Do not lay <WG2343> up for yourselves <WG4771> treasures <WG2344> upon earth, <WG1093> where <WG3699> moth <WG4597> and rust <WG1035> destroy, <WG853> and where <WG3699> thieves <WG2812> break <WG1358> in and steal. <WG2813>

"But lay <WG2343> up for yourselves <WG4771> treasures <WG2344> in heaven, <WG3772> where <WG3699> neither <WG3777> moth <WG4597> nor <WG3777> rust <WG1035> destroys, <WG853> and where <WG3699> thieves <WG2812> do not break <WG1358> in or <WG3761> steal; <WG2813>
for where <WG3699> your treasure <WG2344> is, there <WG1563> will your heart <WG2588> be also. <WG2532>

"The lamp <WG3088> of the body <WG4983> is the eye; <WG3788> if <WG1437> therefore <WG3767> your eye <WG3788> is clear, <WG573> your whole <WG3650> body <WG4983> will be full <WG5460> of light. <WG5460>

"But if <WG1437> your eye <WG3788> is bad, <WG4190> your whole <WG3650> body <WG4983> will be full <WG4652> of darkness. <WG4652> If <WG1487> therefore <WG3767> the light <WG5457> that is in you is darkness, <WG4655> how <WG4214> great <WG4214> is the darkness! <WG4655>

"No <WG3762> one <WG3762> can <WG1410> serve <WG1398> two <WG1417> masters; <WG2962> for either <WG2228> he will hate <WG3404> the one <WG1520> and love <WG25> the other, <WG2087> or <WG2228> he will hold <WG472> to one <WG1520> and despise <WG2706> the other. <WG2087> You cannot <WG1410> <WG3756> serve <WG1398> God <WG2316> and mammon. <WG3126>

"For this <WG3778> reason <WG1223> I say <WG3004> to you, do not be anxious <WG3309> for your life, <WG5590> [as to] what <WG5101> you shall eat, <WG2068> or <WG2228> what <WG5101> you shall drink; <WG4095> nor <WG3366> for your body, <WG4983> [as to] what <WG5101> you shall put <WG1746> on. Is not life <WG5590> more <WG4183> than food, <WG5160> and the body <WG4983> than clothing <WG1742>?

"Look <WG1689> at the birds <WG4071> of the air, <WG3772> that they do not sow, <WG4687> neither <WG3761> do they reap, <WG2325> nor <WG3761> gather <WG4863> into barns, <WG596> and [yet] your heavenly <WG3770> Father <WG3962> feeds <WG5142> them. Are you not worth <WG1308> much <WG3123> more <WG1308> than they?
"And which <WG5101> of you by being anxious <WG3309> can <WG1410> add <WG4369> a [single] cubit <WG4083> to his life's span <WG2244>?

"And why <WG5101> are you anxious <WG3309> about <WG4012> clothing <WG1742>? Observe <WG2648> how <WG4459> the lilies <WG2918> of the field <WG68> grow; <WG837> they do not toil <WG2872> nor <WG3761> do they spin, <WG3514>
yet <WG1161> I say <WG3004> to you that even <WG3761> Solomon <WG4672> in all <WG3956> his glory <WG1391> did not clothe <WG4016> himself like <WG5613> one <WG1520> of these. <WG3778>

"But if <WG1487> God <WG2316> so <WG3779> arrays <WG294> the grass <WG5528> of the field, <WG68> which is [alive] today <WG4594> and tomorrow <WG839> is thrown <WG906> into the furnace, <WG2823> [will He] not much <WG4183> more <WG3123> [do so for] you, O men <WG3640> of little <WG3640> faith <WG3640>?

"Do not be anxious <WG3309> then, <WG3767> saying, <WG3004> 'What <WG5101> shall we eat <WG2068>?' or <WG2228> 'What <WG5101> shall we drink <WG4095>?' or <WG2228> 'With what <WG5101> shall we clothe <WG4016> ourselves?'

"For all <WG3956> these <WG3778> things <WG3778> the Gentiles <WG1484> eagerly <WG1934> seek; <WG1934> for your heavenly <WG3770> Father <WG3962> knows <WG3609> that you need <WG5535> all <WG537> these <WG3778> things. <WG3778>
"But seek <WG2212> first <WG4413> His kingdom <WG932> and His righteousness; <WG1343> and all <WG3956> these <WG3778> things <WG3778> shall be added <WG4369> to you.
"Therefore <WG3767> do not be anxious <WG3309> for tomorrow; <WG839> for tomorrow <WG839> will care <WG3309> for itself. <WG1438> [Each] day <WG2250> has enough <WG713> trouble <WG2549> of its own.
